title: American Routes Leiber & Stoller interview
teaser: Available to all PRX stations - Jerry Leiber and Mike Stoller interview from 2002
description: Remembering Jerry Leiber - from American Routes archive: 2002 interview with Jerry Leiber and Mike Stoller, the songwriting team who produced "Hound Dog" by Big Mama Thornton, "Stand By Me" by Ben E. King, "Jailhouse Rock" by Elvis Presley, and "I'm a Woman" by Peggy Lee.
contentencoded: Remembering Jerry Leiber - from American Routes archive: 2002 interview with Jerry Leiber and Mike Stoller, the songwriting team who produced "Hound Dog" by Big Mama Thornton, "Stand By Me" by Ben E. King, "Jailhouse Rock" by Elvis Presley, and "I'm a Woman" by Peggy Lee.
